title: Ama G. Quansah
text:
Hi, I’m Ama Quansah, a Master of Arts student in Communication Studies at Texas Tech University. My work focuses on health, organizational, and intercultural communication. Lately, I have been exploring how people find and understand health information online, how they respond to health risks, and how we can make reliable health information more accessible. Whether it’s understanding vaccine hesitancy, policy resistance, or the spread of misinformation, I believe effective communication can play a powerful role in building trust and promoting healthier outcomes for all.
This website is in progress! I’ll be updating with new research, and all things communication.

Education

    
        Master of Arts in Communication Studies, Texas Tech University, 2024 - Present
    
    
       Bachelor of Commerce in Marketing, University of Cape Coast, Ghana, 2021
